channel.title: [PI] if statement that checks if you have items
channel.description:
hello, wondering if someone can help me with this. ive used something similar to stop players from teleporting without the required amount of items equiped, how would i change this to check if the player has the item and required amount of that item before being aloud to complete the if statement.
[code]c.getPA().getWearingAmount() > 5[/code]
any ideas? so it checks for item id and if there are moe or less than 5
would this work or have i done it wrong? [code]c.getItems().getItemSlot(995) > 5[/code]
